subject: Re: [junit] Question about testing GUI
msgSnippet: ... I may have misrepresented myself: Dave s book is the only one whose core example, the one used throughout the book, is a Swing UI. Certainly, other people
messageBody:
Ilja Preuss wrote:

> Johannes Link's "Unit Testing in Java" also has a chapter on testing
> Swing GUIs.

I may have misrepresented myself: Dave's book is the only one whose core
example, the one used throughout the book, is a Swing UI. Certainly,
other people have written about it.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
